country: Madagascar, Miscellaneous (French) Indian Ocean Islands, Mayotte, Comoros, Mozambique
title: Red alert for tropical cyclone CHIDO-25. Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 1.051 million .
summary: From 09/12/2024 to 13/12/2024, a Intense Tropical Cyclone (maximum wind speed of 243 km/h) CHIDO-25 was active in SWIndian. The cyclone affects these countries: Madagascar, Miscellaneous (French) Indian Ocean Islands, Mayotte, Comoros, Mozambique (vulnerability High). Estimated population affected by category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 1.051 million .
source: Joint Research Center of the European Commission
